name: ObjectTracker
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: object tracker
des:
People tend to keep things in one place and forget the location of those items later.
It could be a watch or spectacles or anything else. Especially elderly people find it
difficult to remember things and find them when needed. Another major concern is the
people with Alzheimer's disease. They tend to forget things frequently. This skill will help find items in
a home and also support natural and secure interaction using voice recognition.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
